meaning: look to, face, meet, confront, attend, call on

onyomiExamples.meaning: boundary, (nuclear) criticality, critical (mass, pressure, temperature, state, point, etc.)
copying calligraphy without sticking to the model (calligraphy), copying freely

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to look out on, to overlook, to front onto, to face (a situation, crisis, etc.), to meet (e.g. death), to be confronted by, to deal with (an issue), to attend (e.g. a function), to appear (e.g. in court), to be present at, to take part in
